content.value:
Some ideas for celebrating International Women's Day instead of tagging women in lists:

- give money directly to women
- support sex workers
- fight for better child care
- hire women, pay them equally, and promote them
- if you see someone doing cool work, talk about their work
content.html: Some ideas for celebrating International Women's Day instead of tagging women in lists: - give money directly to women - support sex workers - fight for better child care - hire women, pay them equally, and promote them - if you see someone doing cool work, talk about their work
